articles.author: Adam Cooper
articles.title: Stroll: F1 "playing with fire" if Spa is not changed after van 't Hoff's death - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Lance Stroll says motorsport will be "playing with fire" if the Spa circuit is not changed ahead of Formula 1's Belgian GP at the end of this month.
articles.content:
The Canadian's impassioned call came after Dutch Formula Regional driver Dilano van 't Hoff lost his life on Saturday in an accident on a rain-soaked circuit at the top of Raidillon.
The incident in… [+4094 chars]
